reviewtext: I have used a number of Netgear switches and routers over the years and find the FS108 to be simple, rugged, reliable and fast enough at a low price. I used this switch as the central distribution point for CAT6 cable runs in lieu of a more elaborate backboard installation. The switch is wall-mounted in a utility closet and easily accessible if we need to make changes. The switch is as described and was delivered on time.
